forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West wind around 14 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening deepens in Downtown San Francisco, a subtle veil of clouds skims the air, casting a gentle embrace over the city. The brisk west wind whispers softly, carrying the scent of the ocean, while the temperature hovers around 54 degrees, inviting a sense of calm. In the hours ahead, the night will deepen, likely cocooning the streets in shadows, leaving behind only the occasional flicker of streetlights and the distant sounds of gentle waves. 

The dawn will break with a promise of clarity, as Saturday unveils itself in a tapestry of mostly sunny skies. The air will warm, peaking near a comfortable 63 degrees before retreating slightly in the afternoon. Wind gusts will pick up, invigorating the scene, reminding the residents of the urban beauty that lies at their fingertips. As the day unfolds, dressing in layers will be key; a light sweater or jacket will be perfect for the morning chill, while a breathable outfit will serve well as the sun’s warmth cuts through the gentle coastal haze. Outdoor cafes beckon for a leisurely breakfast and a stroll along the waterfront, where one can watch the sails dance on the bay, an everyday reverie painted by the picturesque backdrop of this vibrant city.
